remarks: Define the subset relation for subcategories.  Despite the name, this is not really a "category-aware" definition, which is to say it makes no explicit references to homsets or composition; instead this is a subset-like relation on the functions that are used as subcategory specifications in ~ df-subc , which makes it play an analogous role to the subset relation applied to the subgroups of a group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2017.)
statement:

$d h j s t x $.
